## PopulatableRmm.safeTransfer() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Transfers liquidity to a `recipient` account.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
safeTransfer(params: PositionTransferParams): Promise<PopulatedRmmTransaction<P, SentRmmTransaction<S, RmmReceipt<R, void>>>>;
```

|  params | [PositionTransferParams](./rmm-ethers.positiontransferparams.md) |  |
